resources.string: Connect to vivasemtabaco.com.br and check your personalized plan.

1. When you stop smoking you improve your quality of life and live longer.

 2. The urge to smoke is common when people are trying to quit. For most smokers, urges decrease within the first weeks after quitting.

 3. Maintaining abstinence is crucial. Avoid smoking after the quit date.

 4. Medication doubles your chances of quitting. See a health professional.

 5. Avoid risky situations in the first weeks, such as
 		Drinking alcohol.
 		Tell your friends and family members who smoke that you are trying to stop smoking.

 6. Gaining weight is normal for smokers. It may be a good moment to start exercising and eat more fruits and vegetables.
What have worked on previous quit attempts
Select reminders to be displayed or create your own. Ex: motivational messages, hints, tips, etc.
Set danger places to be warned when you are near them.
